channel.title: Server Programmer
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hey guys! Not sure if many people saw the public Vitality beta, it lasted about one week lmao. Quite a few reasons for this, the main two are: [ul][li]Our vps company shut down[/li] [li]We regret releasing the public beta, there were just too many glitches, and thus made it developer only.[/li][/ul]
.[/CENTER]
I understand that some people may just think we suck, but I really am trying haha :P We've made it a closed beta, and are now coding it when we can. We use dropbox to code, but are open to new ideas. We've got a forums with a small fan base of people waiting to try the server out. We are currently keeping it closed beta for the following reasons:
[ul][li]All the Jagex shutdowns, not worth trying to open a server at the minute.[/li] [li]We want to make it much better[/li] [li]We are fixing glitches[/li] [li]We need more developers and a much bigger awareness of the server[/li][/ul]
So, if you want to help code a great project, please fill in this form and comment below. We are developing PI so you need some knowledge in that area.
[code] First and Last Name:
Date of Birth:
Time Zone:
Past experience in working with Private Servers:
Past experience with RuneScape Private Servers:
Which Languages other than Java do you know:
Examples of your work:
Can you Develop Client-sided content as well:
Other than Private Server Development, please list your capabilities:
How do you wish to be compensated:
How can we contact you: [/code]
We also are looking for a client developer, you can post here or pm me if interested!

item.title: Server Programmer
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

[CENTER]Hey guys! Not sure if many people saw the public Vitality beta, it lasted about one week lmao. Quite a few reasons for this, the main two are:
[ul][li]Our vps company shut down[/li]
[li]We regret releasing the public beta, there were just too many glitches, and thus made it developer only.[/li][/ul]

.[/CENTER]

I understand that some people may just think we suck, but I really am trying haha We’ve made it a closed beta, and are now coding it when we can. We use dropbox to code, but are open to new ideas. We’ve got a forums with a small fan base of people waiting to try the server out. We are currently keeping it closed beta for the following reasons:

[ul][li]All the Jagex shutdowns, not worth trying to open a server at the minute.[/li]
[li]We want to make it much better[/li]
[li]We are fixing glitches[/li]
[li]We need more developers and a much bigger awareness of the server[/li][/ul]

So, if you want to help code a great project, please fill in this form and comment below.
We are developing PI so you need some knowledge in that area.
